Package com.fitconnet.persitence.repository

Interface UserRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,Long>
@Repository("userRepository") public interface UserRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Long>
Repository interface for managing users.

    • findByEmail

      Optional<User> findByEmail(String email)
      Finds a user by email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user to find.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the user with the specified email, if found.

    • findByUserName

      Finds a user by username.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user to find.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the user with the specified username, if found.

    • findByLastName

      Optional<List<User>> findByLastName(String lastName)
      Finds users by last name.
      Parameters:
      lastName - The last name of the users to find.
      Returns:
      An optional containing a list of users with the specified last name.

    • findByRoles

      Optional<List<User>> findByRoles(Role role)
      Finds users by roles.
      Parameters:
      role - The role of the users to find.
      Returns:
      An optional containing a list of users with the specified role.

    • existsByEmail

      Boolean existsByEmail(String email)
      Checks if a user exists by email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email to check.
      Returns:
      true if a user exists with the specified email, false otherwise.
